Title: Establishes the GrowNY pilot program, an economic gardening pilot program within the department of economic development
Summary: Establishes the GrowNY pilot program, an economic gardening pilot program within the department of economic development to stimulate investment in the state economy by providing technical assistance for expanding businesses in the state.
LawCode: Add Art 24 ยง460, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing an economic gardening pilot program within the department of economic development
